ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: Sander Zwart acknowledges funding from the CGIAR Fund Council, Australia (ACIAR), Irish Aid, European Union, International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD), Netherlands, New Zealand, Switzerland, UK, USAID and Thailand for funding to the CGIAR Research Program on Climate Change, Agriculture and Food Security (CCAFS). Pepijn van Oort acknowledges funding from the CGIAR Research Program on Rice (RICE). We acknowledge funding from the project “Improving rice farmers’ decision making in lowland rice‐based systems in East Africa (East Africa ‘RiceAdvice’)”, GIZ project number (14.1432.5‐001.00, 81180340), funded by the Federal Ministry of Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ), Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH. We thank Moctar Dembélé, Postmaster fellow, and Mohamed Hamady, consultant, at the Africa Rice Center for providing technical support in the spatial analysis of the GCM outputs. We thank dr. Sander C. de Vries at Wageningen University for technical support with site selection. We thank dr. Alexander Ruane (NASA) for providing AgMERRA weather data.
